subject: Canoes and Canoeing
lead_paragraph: Oncoming hikers stepped off the trail and made way for two canoes being hauled to Avalanche Lake. It looked hard-core, shouldering boats for 4.4 miles among the Adirondack High Peaks in New York State, or else a little crazy. But at 12 pounds each, they weighed less than a full backpack and were only about one-fifth the weight of most canoes.
